text: Sometimes, I sit down to sketch at the unearthly hour of 3 in the morning!
author: Nafisa Joseph

text: This morning I was laughing at my cat who was running up the stairs and slipped, and pretended like it didn't happen.
author: Jayma Mays

text: My mom was a big 'Smurfs' fan, so she would force me to watch every Saturday morning. I had no choice in the matter. I would jump downstairs on Saturday morning, 'Hurray, cartoons!' and she would say, 'Smurfs! That's what you're watching.'
author: Jayma Mays

text: When you awaken some morning and hear that somebody or other has been discovered, you can put it down as a fact that he discovered himself years ago - since that time he has been toiling, working, and striving to make himself worthy of general discovery.
author: James Whitcomb Riley

text: We had cocktail parties and I'd stay up until 5 in the morning.
author: Dorothy Malone
